description: Consider coefficients U(m,l,k) defined by the identity Sum_{k=1..l} Sum_{j=0..m} A302971(m,j)/A304042(m,j) * k^j * (T-k)^j = Sum_{k=0..m} (-1)^(m-k) * U(m,l,k) * T^k that holds for all positive integers l,m,T. This sequence gives 2-column table read by rows, where n-th row lists coefficients U(1,n,k) for k = 0, 1 and n >= 1.
